title: The Social Dilemma: A conversation
description:
Watch our podcast channel: https://bit.ly/3mSXmMf
Check out our online storytelling course: https://moment.8ocm68.net/keM6z
Colin and Samir discuss the new Netflix film, The Social Dilemma and give their thoughts on the Attention economy and their role in it.
